1551680.name: Sleeping Dragon
1551680.description:
Awaken the memories of a forgotten world.

Sleeping Dragon is a cozy puzzle adventure set in vibrant diorama levels, blending the whimsical charm of animes with clean, low-poly aesthetics.

Take on the role of Hiru, a young traveler lost in the Dream Lands. To find your way home, you must explore the realm of the Great Sleeping Dragon. With the guidance of your quirky companion, the Cuckoo Clock-Birdie, you’ll navigate floating islands, solve perspective-based puzzles, and recover the 7 sacred totems that hold the dragon’s lost memories.

Why does the Dragon sleep? And what secrets do its memories hold?

Key Features:

  • Handcrafted Dioramas: Explore intricate 3D worlds filled with secrets hidden around every corner.

  • Whimsical Art Style: A relaxing visual experience inspired by classic anime aesthetics and cozy vibes.

  • Tactile Puzzles: Rotate the environment and interact with the world to find hidden paths and collectibles.

  • A Relaxing Journey: Experience a stress-free adventure focused on exploration, discovery, and atmosphere.
1551680.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
